text: Hana's friend

── Next month, some of the people I got along with from class
are talking about having a little class reunion.

A class reunion?
That sounds fun──!

Right? I thought it might be a fun event for you
to make a homecoming at.

But I'm sure you're busy with work, and coming all of the way
back to Okayama must be quite the hassle, right Hana?
...Yeah, but──

I actually had today off, so
I think that I might be able to pull it off──

Really?
── Then I'll contact you again once we've figured out a date!

Sure, thanks!
I'll also let you know once I have an idea of my schedule as well.
Motion

...You know, it really is hard to believe. That the school's idol
would go on to become a real idol, right?
Ahah, what's with that!?

Eh, you didn't know!?
That everyone used to call you the school's idol back then!?
Eh! Really?

Uwaaah...
The person in question never heard it, huh～
Motion

...Speaking of idols, by the way.
Do you ever disguise yourself in public, Hana?
Ehh?

I was thinking you might be like "Today's a hat and glasses" when you go out!
If you go out normally, don't people call out to you?

Ahah, nothing like that happens, you know.
I'm still a new face afterall.
Ehh, is that so...

...Ah, woah.
I need to get moving or I won't make my flight!
Waah, let's hurry and pay and get out of here!
